General.Name: Sysgration Ltd
General.Description: Sysgration Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile electronics and power management products in Taiwan, Asia, the United States, and internationally. It offers universal panel computers, industrial tablet PCs, and head mount devices. The company also provides internal and external BLE TPMS products; and energy bricks and container based solar energy storage systems. In addition, it offers battery pack products, such as power stations, EV battery packs, and UPS LIB packs; power devices comprising power conditioning system, MPPT charger, and charging station; grid-tied ESS, off-grid ESS, and battery cabinet and pack; and power supply and battery backup centralized solutions. Sysgration Ltd. was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5.Name: Ms. Hsiu-Mei  Tsai
5.Title: Chief Financial Officer & Chief Corp. Governance Officer
